text:
You have trained a text classification model in TensorFlow using AI Platform. You want to use the trained model for batch predictions on text data stored in
BigQuery while minimizing computational overhead. What should you do?

choices.text: Export the model to BigQuery ML.
Deploy and version the model on AI Platform.
Use Dataflow with the SavedModel to read the data from BigQuery.
Submit a batch prediction job on AI Platform that points to the model location in Cloud Storage.
